titles.timeTravel: Podróże w Czasie sp.z.o.o. założono dnia {0}

paradoxes.pastTravel: Wynajdź podróżowanie w czasie w przeszłości
paradoxes.moonLanding: Wykonaj pierwszy krok na księżycu (zamiast Amstronga)
paradoxes.backToTheFuture: Spraw aby Twój tata zabrał Twoją mame na studniówkę
paradoxes.futureTravel: Wynajdź podróże w czasie w przyszłości
paradoxes.stop: Powstrzymaj samego siebie przed wynalezieniem podróży w czasie

inventor.head: You hit your head while standing up from the toilet and figured out how to build a time machine from common household objects.
inventor.first: You built your first time machine on Day {0} of the new era - Era of Time Travel
inventor.firstSigil: A weird squiggly symbol apperead on the floor where the time machine stands. You are pretty sure it's called a Sigil, but you don't know how you know it.
inventor.timeTravelLab: After powering up, your time machine caught a stream of entropy and transported you to a strange location. There are really weird devices in there.
inventor.dreams: You started dreaming about your Sigils. It's nothing to worry about.

social.surveys: You're getting a modest income filling out surveys online
social.bot: You got a discord bot completing the surveys for you
social.cultStart: You accidentally started an online cult. Nothing bad will come out of it, you're sure.

adventurer.nothing: Nothing of note happenned to you yet. Maybe try some adventuring.
adventurer.guild: You found an Adventurer's Guild on the next street over. They have some cool stuff on sale.

events.sodaLuck: You got lucky and got a lucky prize-code under a soda bottlecap
events.cat: You found a cat stuck on a tree. You managed to help it
events.coin: You found a coin on the streets. Lucky you! (+1 $)
events.surveys: You found an useful comment on the internet - free cash working from home? Sign me in! (+1 passive income)
events.soda: You found a free soda pop. Refreshing.
events.discord: You paid 20$ for an auto-survey discord bot. It's basically free money! (+1 passive income).
events.unknownDreams: You dreamt about your Sigils - they sang a song to you in an incomprensible language. It sounded nice.
events.travelDreams: You dreamt about your Sigils - they sang you a song about your travel.
events.shift: You were so bored you picked up an actual shift in a real job. Pay is not good though. (+10 $)
events.cultStart: While trolling on discord you accidentally started a cult worshipping your bot. (+ 1 passive income)
events.doodleSigil: While doodling out of boredom your pencil disapperead. That's normal, right? (+ 1 sigil)
events.paintSigil: For your time machine's first birthday you got it a new paint job from the nice fellow with the 'The End is Nigh' sign. (+ 1 sigil)
